data.eml:eml: The Central Asian Herina (Diptera: Ulidiidae), with the description of a new species from Afghanistan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kameneva, Elena P., Pljushtch, Igor G. (2010): The Central Asian Herina (Diptera: Ulidiidae), with the description of a new species from Afghanistan. Zootaxa 2424: 42-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.194539
